definitions: (of meat or fish) having had the bones removed before cooking or serving
shortDefinitions: (of meat or fish) having had bones removed before being sold or served

definitions: (of a person) having bones of the specified type

examples.text: she was fine-boned and boyishly slim

definitions: (of a garment) stiffened with strips of plastic or whalebone to give shape to the figure or the garment

examples.text: the dress has a boned bodice

shortDefinitions: (of garment) stiffened with strips of plastic or whalebone to give shape to wearer's figure or garment
